inputs.description: Helius API key (non stockée) — utilisé pour https://mainnet.helius-rpc.com/?api-key=...

tasks.label: SwapBack: Simulate Native Swap (Meteora/Phoenix/Lifinity)
tasks.detail: Simule RouterSwap sur mainnet (simulateTransaction) pour Meteora/Phoenix/Lifinity
args: cd /workspaces/SwapBack && export SOLANA_RPC_URL="${input:swapbackRpcUrl}" SWAPBACK_AUTO_CREATE_KEYPAIR=1 && KP="${input:swapbackKeypairPath}" && if [[ -n "$KP" && -f "$KP" ]]; then export SOLANA_KEYPAIR="$KP"; else unset SOLANA_KEYPAIR; fi && if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then print -r -- "[task] node_modules manquant: npm ci"; npm ci; fi && noglob ./node_modules/.bin/tsx ./scripts/simulate-native-swap.ts --venues=METEORA_DLMM,PHOENIX,LIFINITY
